duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate massive steel structures like large steel girders, beams, and nodes for skyscrapers and large power generation equipment.
Perform weld testing using 3 position / 1g, 2, g & 3g , 3 position / ½” Thick carbon steel plates.
Qualifications include 3-5 years of industry experience, High School Diploma / GED, NCCER and OSHA 10 preferred, and passing a pre-employment drug screen.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years industry experience, High School Diploma / GED, NCCER and OSHA 10 preferred.
